mapper.insert: insert into member(memId, password, memberName, email, phone, birth, foot, regdate, auth, del, profile, grade, point, totalPoint) values(#{memId}, #{password}, #{memberName}, #{email}, #{phone}, #{birth}, #{foot}, now(), 0, 0, #{profile} , '걸음마', 100, 100)
mapper.update: update member SET point=point-#{point} where memId=#{memId}
mapper.select: SELECT A.*, B.crewAuth FROM member A INNER JOIN crewmember B ON A.memId = B.memId WHERE A.crewSeq=#{crewSeq}
